title: San Juan National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      Download our Education Fee Waiver FormSan Juan National Historic Site (16+) $5.00 Children 15 and under Free!Federal Recreation Annual Pass$80.00 - AnnualValid for Cardholder and 3 additional Adults Federal Recreation Senior Pass$10.00 - For LifeValid for Cardholder and 3 additional Adults Federal Recreation Access PassFree! - For LifeValid for Cardholder and 3 additional Adults Federal Recreation Volunteer Pass500 hours or more - AnnualValid for Cardholder and 3 additional Adults Park Pass$25.00 - AnnualValid only for San Juan NHSValid for Cardholder and 3 additional Adults Parking FeeParking fee is $2.00 per hour. Enter the visitor center to receive park and payment information.
